data.actual_result: No dragging hint is shown, but when dropped, server does move.
data.expected_result: Drag hint (green bar) is shown while dragging
data.short_description: On Firefox, Dragging to re-order channels does not show a drag hint, but dragging works (possible extend fsUTe3hY)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have channel editing privileges for a server - Click and drag a channel name - Drop the channel in the intended position
